Articles.Content:
Hello gents. I haven't been here in like a year but I did pre-order the game.

Now where do I download a copy? The one on the site says Demo
Hi! You download KSP by going into your shop account, go into the store, then click on KSP and there should be a button under add to cart and gift.

Hi! You download KSP by going into your shop account, go into the store, then click on KSP and there should be a button under add to cart and gift.

it says there is no such account
Did you spell your username and password right? As for I am not a Mod I can not help you much further.

I actually did get into my store account. But it wants me to pay for the game.

I paid for it. Where do I get in touch with mods?

Welcome to the community pointmanzero

The mods can;t help with this one, you'll need to email Squad at [email protected] and provide a proof of purchase such as a paypal receipt.

They might not even need that if they can look up your real name and the email you used to purchase KSP, good luck getting your account fixed pointmanzero, Squad will do their best to help
